pages.text: $(li)The Deep Ocean is a variant of the Ocean biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The terrain of this place is composed of mostly by Gravel.$(br)$(li)You can find some water vegetation too, like Seagrass or Kelp Plants.

$(li)Some aquatic animals like Cods, Salmons, Dolphins, Squids, Cachalot Whales and Frilled Sharks can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Deep Ocean$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
